SEARCH
Package com.myfinanceapp.service

Class ThemeService

java.lang.Object
com.myfinanceapp.service.ThemeService
public class ThemeService extends Object
Service class for managing the application's theme and styling. This service provides functionality for: - Switching between day and night modes - Managing consistent styling across the application - Providing theme-specific styles for various UI components - Handling color schemes and visual elements The service supports two themes: - Day mode: Light theme with white backgrounds and dark text - Night mode: Dark theme with dark backgrounds and light text
Version:
4.0
Author:
SE_Group110

  • Constructor Details

    • ThemeService

      public ThemeService()
      Constructs a new ThemeService instance. Initializes with day mode as the default theme.

  • Method Details

    • setTheme

      public void setTheme(boolean isDay)
      Sets the application theme mode.
      Parameters:
      isDay - true for day mode, false for night mode

    • isDayMode

      public boolean isDayMode()
      Checks if the application is currently in day mode.
      Returns:
      true if in day mode, false if in night mode

    • getCurrentThemeStyle

      public String getCurrentThemeStyle()
      Gets the background style for the main application window.
      Returns:
      CSS style string for the main background

    • getCurrentFormBackgroundStyle

      public String getCurrentFormBackgroundStyle()
      Gets the background style for form elements.
      Returns:
      CSS style string for form backgrounds

    • getTextColorStyle

      public String getTextColorStyle()
      Gets the text color style for the current theme.
      Returns:
      CSS style string for text color

    • getButtonStyle

      public String getButtonStyle()
      Gets the button style for the current theme. Includes background color, text color, and font weight.
      Returns:
      CSS style string for buttons

    • getTableStyle

      public String getTableStyle()
      Gets the table style for the current theme. Includes styles for the table view, cells, and rows.
      Returns:
      CSS style string for tables

    • getTableHeaderStyle

      public String getTableHeaderStyle()
      Gets the table header style for the current theme. Includes styles for column headers and their labels.
      Returns:
      CSS style string for table headers

    • getThemeStylesheet

      public String getThemeStylesheet()
      Gets the complete theme stylesheet for the current theme. Includes styles for: - Combo boxes - Date pickers - Popup menus - Calendar components - Hover and selection states
      Returns:
      Complete CSS stylesheet string for the current theme
